attributes.action: Stop the deselection of Joe Benton in favour of Tony Blairs son who knows nothing of the deprevation of Bootle in Merseyside
attributes.additional_details: I wish to support Joe Benton. I hope to prevent his de selection, he has been a stalwart MP for Bootle in Merseyside for many years. He lives in the area and knows exactly what the people of Bootle need. Ewan Blair has no idea what people of this area need and I think he is far too young and has no conceivable idea at the needs of Bootle and its constituents.
